Class CMISFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.cyberstream.workflow.engine.cmis.CMISFolder

  • @Service
public class CMISFolder
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all business rules related to CMIS folder operations

    nlyk

        Creates a new folder in the CMIS repository
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent folder which a new child folder will be created (Can be null. In that case the new folder will be at the root of the repository)
        folderName - The new folder's name
        Returns:
        The new Folder
